func.name: load_bmp
func.desc:
Loads a BMP file and creates a :class:`pygame2.sdl.video.Surface` from it.
Loads a BMP file and creates a :class:`pygame2.sdl.video.Surface` from it. The *file* argument can be either a file object or the filename.
.. note::
The file object *must* support binary read and write access. This is especially important for Python 3.x users.

func.name: save_bmp
func.desc:
Saves a surface to a bitmap file.
Saves a :class:`pygame2.sdl.video.Surface` to the specified file, where *file* can be a filename or file object.
.. note::
The file object *must* support binary read and write access. This is especially important for Python 3.x users.
